title: Uparkinglot
description: uParkingLot is a robust project developed as part of my university courses, which focuses on creating an innovative parking management system. The main goal was to design an easy-to-use web application and backend system that optimizes the parking experience for both drivers and parking managers.

title: Urdentalappointment
description: Urdentalappointment is a comprehensive project developed as part of my university studies. The main objective of the project was to design and implement a user-friendly web application aimed at optimizing the medical appointment scheduling process for both healthcare professionals and patients. The app seamlessly integrates real-time data, streamlining the scheduling process and improving overall efficiency.

title: Pomodoro
description: Pomodoro is a project developed in my free time, focusing on creating a comprehensive productivity improvement system based on Pomodoro. The main goal was to design an easy-to-use web application to help people manage their time effectively using the Pomodoro technique. The application integrates real-time tracking and task management.
